column2: Federation of Aboriginal Nations of the Americas sign historic Peace Treaty
column5: On April 18 in Portsmouth Rhode Island Member Nations of the Federation of Aboriginal Nations of the Americas which include three indigenous first contact tribes from Rhode Island Massachusetts and New Jersey/Pennsylvania signed treaties with allies including the Kinakwii Sovereign Confederacy of Canada and formally form an Inter-Tribal Court. FANA made a formal announcement to today which can be read here: www.fana.global/...
